nodes.text: QS100 was a gigantic welding arm used for massive constructions. Kyle Katarn stumbled upon them twice during the Dark Trooper Project.
The QS100 Welding Arm is named after a real-life device programmed by Star Wars: Dark Forces lead programmer Ray Gresko while he worked in the robotics industry.[source?]
In the game, the QS is one of the few objects of the game engine wholly composed of 3d polygons.
